about_the_game: Get into typing-style battles against unknown enemies that are trying to wipe out humankind from all the universe. Play the role of a commander and control ships mentally with a Brain Ship Program, while you are diving in the greatest space war against illiteracy and surviving to regain control of every human star-base and colony that fell under the enemy's power. Try our Typing Fingers Demo, you'll be part of the training mission where you will go through some trials to test all of the ship weapons and get to know the mechanics of the game as well as the difficulty levels.
detailed_description: Get into typing-style battles against unknown enemies that are trying to wipe out humankind from all the universe. Play the role of a commander and control ships mentally with a Brain Ship Program, while you are diving in the greatest space war against illiteracy and surviving to regain control of every human star-base and colony that fell under the enemy's power. Try our Typing Fingers Demo, you'll be part of the training mission where you will go through some trials to test all of the ship weapons and get to know the mechanics of the game as well as the difficulty levels.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS X 10.8 or Higher
  • Processor: Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS Catalina 10.15.7
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: Typing Fingers - Enemy Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel -OR- AMD
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
